description.en:
Addon to UniversalAutoload to add support for a large selection of Modhub vehicles. This mod adds configurations for many popular Modhub vehicles and trailers.
Currently Supported: - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_PongePack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_RollandPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_TLX3500_Series - FS22_TLX_Phoenix - FS22_orkelTX130 - FS22_adurante_R200A_crossplay - FS22_Pack_Aguas_Tenias_Platforms - FS22_lizardFlatbedTrailer - FS22_JohnDeere_1075HayWagon - FS22_lizardTrailerPack - FS22_Randon_BulkCarrier_RLine - FS22_MAN_TGX_26640_Platform - FS22_PTS_4_5_BURLAK_Pack - FS22_OldLowTrailer - FS22_Tps_001 - FS22_lizard_sp03_crossplay - FS22_camara_sp03 - FS22_LizardTrailer - FS22_53ftDryVan - FS22_flatBedTrailerCombo_AutoPack - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack_crossplay - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack - FS22_PackingFacility - FS22_seeds_addon_crossplay - FS22_SeedPotatoFarmBuildings - FS22_MapleSyrupProduction - FS22_DieselCanister - FS22_Farm_Supply_Pack - FS22_IndustrialSugar - FS22_Pallets_And_Bags_Pack - FS22_Pioneer_Seeds - More to come!
description.de:
Erweiterung für Universal Autoload. Dieser Mod fügt Autoload Konfigurationen für viele beliebte Modhub Fahrzeuge und Anhänger hinzu.
Momentan unterstützt: - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_PongePack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_RollandPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_TLX3500_Series - FS22_TLX_Phoenix - FS22_orkelTX130 - FS22_adurante_R200A_crossplay - FS22_Pack_Aguas_Tenias_Platforms - FS22_lizardFlatbedTrailer - FS22_JohnDeere_1075HayWagon - FS22_lizardTrailerPack - FS22_Randon_BulkCarrier_RLine - FS22_MAN_TGX_26640_Platform - FS22_PTS_4_5_BURLAK_Pack - FS22_OldLowTrailer - FS22_Tps_001 - FS22_lizard_sp03_crossplay - FS22_camara_sp03 - FS22_LizardTrailer - FS22_53ftDryVan - FS22_flatBedTrailerCombo_AutoPack - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack_crossplay - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack - FS22_PackingFacility - FS22_seeds_addon_crossplay - FS22_SeedPotatoFarmBuildings - FS22_MapleSyrupProduction - FS22_DieselCanister - FS22_Farm_Supply_Pack - FS22_IndustrialSugar - FS22_Pallets_And_Bags_Pack - FS22_Pioneer_Seeds - Bald noch mehr!
description.cz:
Rozšíření k modu UniversalAutoload, které umožňuje přidat další konfigurace pro velké množství různých vozidel z Modhubu. Aktuálně přidává konfigurační parametry pro mnohé oblíbené vleky a další vozidla na Modhubu, uvedená v následujícím seznamu.
Aktuálně podporovaná vozidla: - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_PongePack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_RollandPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_TLX3500_Series - FS22_TLX_Phoenix - FS22_orkelTX130 - FS22_adurante_R200A_crossplay - FS22_Pack_Aguas_Tenias_Platforms - FS22_lizardFlatbedTrailer - FS22_JohnDeere_1075HayWagon - FS22_lizardTrailerPack - FS22_Randon_BulkCarrier_RLine - FS22_MAN_TGX_26640_Platform - FS22_PTS_4_5_BURLAK_Pack - FS22_OldLowTrailer - FS22_Tps_001 - FS22_lizard_sp03_crossplay - FS22_camara_sp03 - FS22_LizardTrailer - FS22_53ftDryVan - FS22_flatBedTrailerCombo_AutoPack - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack_crossplay - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack - FS22_PackingFacility - FS22_seeds_addon_crossplay - FS22_SeedPotatoFarmBuildings - FS22_MapleSyrupProduction - FS22_DieselCanister - FS22_Farm_Supply_Pack - FS22_IndustrialSugar - FS22_Pallets_And_Bags_Pack - FS22_Pioneer_Seeds - A další budou přidávána!
